name: THE SINS//002: THE MORNING AFTER
description:
ACT 002. MAIN HOUSE SCENE.

When the sun begins to appear. The shadow begins to shift. 
‘What now?’ May asked Carl who insisted that everything will be fine. She wondered how can he be so calm after what happened. Overheard from the kitchen, Kate seemed busy with her phone. She felt sorry for her sister. May deserves better, she thought. From a distance, the sound of police sirens is heard.
